Class Audio

  • java.lang.Object
    • Audio

  • public class Audio
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for playing all the audio files found in the game. It loads all the files, and has different methods for playing each file.
    Version:
    5.0
    Author:
    Aviv Haber. Worked on initially creating the class on May 29. Approximate Work: 2 hours, Rian Waterson. Added more sound files to the class. May 31. Approximate Work: 2 hours

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) javax.sound.sampled.Clip damage
      The sound file for when the demon takes damage.
      (package private) javax.sound.sampled.Clip music
      The sound file for the game's background music.
      (package private) javax.sound.sampled.Clip right
      The sound file for when the user gets a math question right.
      (package private) javax.sound.sampled.Clip shatter
      The sound file for when the wooden doors are shattered.
      (package private) javax.sound.sampled.Clip vortex
      The sound file for when the vortex is spinning in the introduction.
      (package private) javax.sound.sampled.Clip wrong
      The sound file for when the user gets a math question wrong.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Audio()
      Loads all the audio files and prepares them for playing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void playDamage()
      Plays the wood shattering sound.
      void playMusic()
      Plays and loops and backgroun music sound.
      void playRight()
      Plays the right answer sound.
      void playShatter() 
      void playVortex()
      Plays the vortex spinning sound.
      void playWrong()
      Plays the wrong answer sound.
      void stopMusic()
      Stops the background music sound.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
